properties.areaDesc: Waters from Pt. St. George to Cape Mendocino CA from 10 to 60 nm
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 31 at 2:52PM PST until February 3 at 12:00PM PST by NWS Eureka CA
properties.description:
* WHAT...NW winds 20 to 30 kt with occasional gusts to 35 kt and
seas 14 to 19 ft.

* WHERE...Pt St George to Cape Mendocino 10 to 60 nm.

* WHEN...From 3 AM Saturday to noon Monday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 3 AM SATURDAY TO NOON MONDAY
